article.title: OBAMA CALLS DEPORTING WRONG IMMIGRANT TACK

title_result: Reports Indicate ICE Arresting Numerous Illegal Immigrants for Deportation; President Comments on Possibly Rewriting Executive Order on Travel Ban; President Trump Meets with Japanese Prime Minister; Reports Indicate Michael Flynn Spoke with Russian Ambassador to U.S. on Sanctions Before Trump Inauguration; Traumatic Effect of Immigration on Refugees Examined; Town Halls Across U.S. Seeing Protests against Repealing Obamacare. Aired 10-11a ET
